attributes.action: legislate against spam by post and telephone
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prevent companies from filling letterboxes with unsolicited adverts and offers. Prevent them from telephoning people (cold calling),especially from night workers who do not wish to be woken up by the offer of a loan, or, "you have won a competition" .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
